text: Oloye Ernest Adegunle Oladeinde Shonekan (9 May 1936 - 11 January 2022) was a Nigerian politician, lawyer and businessman. He was appointed the interim President of Nigeria by General Ibrahim Babangida on 26 August 1993. Babangida resigned after the 1993 election was annulled.Ernest Shonekan: Na fake news tori say former Nigeria interim leader don die at BBC Shonekan died on 11 January 2022 in Lekki, Nigeria at the age of 85. == References == Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Presidents of Nigeria Category:Nigerian lawyers Category:Nigerian businesspeople
title: Ernest Shonekan
